data.name: A Robot's Journey Demo
data.detailed_description:
A Robot's Journey Demo is the first 20-30 minutes of the full length game. It is intended to introduce you to one of several beautiful landscapes to explore, the puzzles and obstacles to overcome, and the heartfelt story that will unfold as fragments are collected and childhood memories are reflected on.

ABOUT THE GAME

In the full game of A Robot's Journey, explore several beautiful landscapes while collecting parts, solving puzzles, and overcoming obstacles in this emotional single-player, 3rd-person adventure game.

ABOUT THE DEVELOPER

I began making A Robot's Journey just before my daughter was born just over a year ago. I work on it on nights and weekends and the full game is due to be released in early 2022.

data.short_description: This is where A Robot's Journey begins. Traverse and explore while collecting energy, gathering fragments, overcoming obstacles, and solving puzzles in this 3rd person, exploration, puzzle adventure Demo.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, Windows 8 or Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel or AMD Duel Core CPU
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 10 Feature Level AMD or NVIDIA
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
